string.name: wp_workflow_step_test_results_title
string.context: Header text for the card that shows basic test results information, and allows jumping to the test results activity

string.name: wp_workflow_step_medications_title
string.context: Header text for the card that shows basic medications information, and allows jumping to the medications activity

string.name: wp_workflow_step_additional_information
string.context: Text that appears in the button that shows and hides additional text for the step

string.name: wp_workflow_step_section_updated_announcement
string.context: Text that will be read out by the screen reader when the Happening Now section auto-updates. Will be followed by the updates that occurred

resources.string: Se actualizó la sección Eventos actuales.

string.name: wp_workflow_step_button_added_announcement
string.context: Text that will be read out by the screen reader when the test results or medications widget/button has been added. Will be followed by the content in that button. %1$@ - the title of the widget that was added

string.name: wp_workflow_step_button_updated_announcement
string.context: Text that will be read out by the screen reader when the test results or medications widget/button updates. Will be followed by the updates that occurred. %1$@ - the title of the widget that was updated

string.name: wp_workflow_step_care_progressed
string.context: Text that will be read out by the screen reader when the current step of care progresses. %1$@ - the new step of care

string.name: wp_workflow_step_in_progress
string.context: Text that appears when self registration is in progress

string.name: wp_workflow_step_complete_registration
string.context: Text that appears inside the registration card, indicating the user should complete registration

string.name: wp_workflow_step_registration_go
string.context: Text that appears inside the button that leads to the registration activity, indicating the user will go to registration

string.name: wp_workflow_step_sef_reg_added_announcement
string.context: Text that will be read out by the screen reader when the self registration section has been added.

string.name: wp_workflow_step_sef_reg_updated_announcement
string.context: Text that will be read out by the screen reader when the self registration section updates.

string.name: wp_workflow_step_waittime_added_announcement
string.context: (DO NOT TRANSLATE, FEATURE NOT ON AND LIKELY TO CHANGE)Text that will be read out by the screen reader when the wait time section has been added.

resources.string: Se agregó información sobre el tiempo de espera.

string.name: wp_workflow_step_waittime_updated_announcement
string.context: (DO NOT TRANSLATE, FEATURE NOT ON AND LIKELY TO CHANGE)Text that will be read out by the screen reader when the wait time section auto-updates. Note that this does not necessarily mean that the update is that the estimated wait time itself has been updated

resources.string: Se actualizó información sobre el tiempo de espera.

string.name: wp_workflow_step_waittime_learn_more
string.context: (DO NOT TRANSLATE, FEATURE NOT ON AND LIKELY TO CHANGE)Text that appears in a button that shows additional information about a wait time prediction. Also used as the header for the view displaying the additional information

string.name: wp_workflow_step_waittime_updated
string.context: (DO NOT TRANSLATE, FEATURE NOT ON AND LIKELY TO CHANGE)Text that appears under the wait time prediction when it gets updated. %1$@ - the localized time that the wait time was updated (eg. 10:30 PM)

string.name: wp_workflow_step_waittime_generic_explanation_header
string.context: (DO NOT TRANSLATE, FEATURE NOT ON AND LIKELY TO CHANGE)Header text for explanation of the unpredictability of wait times

string.name: wp_workflow_step_waittime_generic_explanation
string.context: (DO NOT TRANSLATE, FEATURE NOT ON AND LIKELY TO CHANGE)Text explaining the unpredictability of wait times in the emergency room

resources.string: Tenga en cuenta que las predicciones de los tiempos de espera son estimaciones y pueden cambiar rápidamente. Atendemos a todos los pacientes que llegan y priorizamos a aquellos con condiciones potencialmente mortales. Factores como pacientes críticos que llegan, personal disponible y tratamientos complejos pueden hacer que los tiempos de espera sean más largos. MyChart calcula automáticamente estas estimaciones y no implican la participación directa de su equipo de tratamiento.

string.name: wp_workflow_step_waittime_delay_header
string.context: (DO NOT TRANSLATE, FEATURE NOT ON AND LIKELY TO CHANGE)Header text for explanation of why a patient's wait time was updated. %1$@ - the localized time that the wait time was updated (eg. 10:30 PM)

resources.string: Su estimación del tiempo de espera se actualizó más recientemente a la(s)%1$@

string.name: wp_workflow_step_waittime_step_explanation_header
string.context: (DO NOT TRANSLATE, FEATURE NOT ON AND LIKELY TO CHANGE)Header text for explanation of how wait times are calculated
